item.name: Admin Handling
Login process of admins users.
GET all admin users.
POST - create a new admin user.
GET - the requested admin user data.
PUT - update the specific admin user.
DELETE - delete the specific admin user.
Auth
Logout - handle the logout process.

request.description: Revokes the requester user's access token.

item.name: Bookable Reception Times
item.description: Groups the API methods of the Bookable Appointments.

item.name: GET - every bookable reception times for a specific doctor.

query.description: Must be a valid date in the format Y-m-d.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i. Must be a date after start_time.

request.description: If the requester user id a doctor it will get its own appointments.

item.name: POST - create a bookable reception time.

query.description: Must be a valid date in the format Y-m-d.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i. Must be a date after start_time.

item.name: GET - a bookable reception time.
PUT - modify a bookable reception time.

query.description: Must be a valid date in the format Y-m-d.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i.
Must be a valid date in the format H:i. Must be a date after start_time.

request.description:
It can be modified if a patient user is not
booked it.

item.name: DELETE - delete a bookable reception time.

request.description: It can not be deleted if a patient user booked.

item.name: Doctor Handling
Login process of doctor users.
POST - create a new doctor.
PUT - modify the doctor whose id is sent.
DELETE - delete the doctor user whose id is sent.
GET - the requested doctor data.
PUT - modify the doctor whose id is sent.
GET - every doctor user of the system.
Every User
item.description: APIs for every user of the system.

item.name: GET - every user of the system if role filter not provided.
GET - a user of the system.
Patient Handling
POST - create/register a new patient user.
Login process of patients.
GET - get every patient users of the system.
UPDATE - modify patient users data.
DELETE - delete a specific patient user.
GET - get the requested patient user.
UPDATE - modify patient users data.
Reserved Bookings
item.description:
Groups the APIs of Reserved Bookings,
that happens when a patient books an appointment.

item.name: GET - every reserved booking's data.
GET - a reserved appointment's details.
POST - book a reception time created by a doctor user.
